name: Paymints
description: Paymints.io is a secure, digital, white-label SaaS platform that allows buyers to transfer funds for many types of real estate transactions. Escrow holders and settlement agents can also disburse funds to clients or vendors using our proprietary platform. Our goal is to save you time, by avoiding lines at the bank; money, by lowering fees; and saving the environment by eliminating the use of paper and reducing CO2 emissions.

name: Chqmate
description: Chqmate is the world’s first interactive cheque splitting and online payment app, designed to take the stress out of shared expenses. Whether you're splitting a bill at dinner, rent with roommates, or a group gift, Chqmate makes it seamless and instant. Simply scan, split, and pay — all within the app. Say goodbye to awkward math and late payments — with Chqmate, everyone pays their share, hassle-free.

name: UPTOK
description: Uptok transforms your digital storefront into an intelligent sales floor. With powerful intent detection, video chat, and co-browsing, Uptok enables real-time, personalized sales consultations directly on your website, app, or kiosk. It identifies serious buyers and seamlessly escalates the conversation to your human sales experts at the perfect moment. This high-touch approach boosts engagement, trust, and conversions by replicating the in-store experience online. Whether it's guiding product discovery or helping close the deal, Uptok makes online selling smarter and more human.

name: Plaeto
description: Plaeto is a modern social content-sharing platform that brings creativity, discovery, and connection into one seamless experience. Designed for mobile-first users, Plaeto allows you to share updates, follow trends, explore curated content categories, and interact through posts and media. With features like tagging, topic-based navigation (like Food, Travel, and Nature), and user profiles, it blends the feel of a personalized social feed with powerful discovery tools. The clean login interface and Google integration make onboarding quick and user-friendly. Whether you're posting a thought, browsing blasts, or building your social presence, Plaeto gives you a sleek and interactive digital space to engage.

name: Sale Assist
description: SaleAssist is an AI-powered live video commerce platform designed to revolutionize the way businesses sell online. We help brands deliver personalized, interactive shopping experiences by bridging the gap between physical and digital retail. With real-time video consultations, businesses can engage customers, answer questions instantly, and drive higher conversions. Our platform brings the in-store feel to the screen, making every interaction more human and impactful. Born from a vision to transform e-commerce, SaleAssist empowers businesses to build trust, boost sales, and gain deeper customer insights. Whether you're a growing brand or an enterprise, SaleAssist helps you sell smarter and connect better.

name: OneStream Live
description: OneStream Live is a trailblazing all-in-one live streaming platform designed for professionals, creators, and businesses alike. Originally known for pioneering pre-recorded streaming, OneStream Live has evolved into a powerful solution for creating, scheduling, and multistreaming high-quality live and recorded content. With support for 45+ social media platforms and web destinations simultaneously, it empowers users to reach wider audiences effortlessly. Whether you're broadcasting in real-time or scheduling a pre-recorded session, OneStream Live ensures a seamless and professional streaming experience across all channels.

name: Vint Market
description: Vint Market is a Germany-based store offering a curated selection of stylish bags, backpacks, wallets, jewelry, belts, hats, glasses, watches and other premium accessories. With a focus on quality craftsmanship and timeless design, Vint Market brings together fashion-forward pieces that elevate everyday style. Whether you're looking for a bold statement or a classic essential, Vint Market has something for every taste.

name: Haiti Takes Root
description: Vint Market is a Germany-based store offering a curated selection of stylish bags, backpacks, wallets, jewelry, belts, hats, glasses, watches and other premium accessories. With a focus on quality craftsmanship and timeless design, Vint Market brings together fashion-forward pieces that elevate everyday style. Whether you're looking for a bold statement or a classic essential, Vint Market has something for every taste.

name: IGIVU
description: IGIVU is a leading provider of end-to-end XR solutions, specializing in Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), and Mixed Reality (MR). From VR headset rentals and pre-configuration to synchronized shows and custom content creation, IGIVU delivers seamless, immersive experiences tailored to your needs. Operating across the U.S., we’ve empowered over 3,000 corporations, universities, and healthcare institutions with cutting-edge XR for events, conferences, and training. Our long-term collaborations with institutions like Stanford and Boston University highlight our commitment to innovation and impact. To expand access, IGIVU is developing a robust XR marketplace for software and hardware solutions. Whether for a one-time event or a strategic initiative, IGIVU is your trusted partner for transformative XR experiences.

name: TOMEI
description: Tomei is a leading e-commerce destination for exquisite jewellery and accessories, offering a blend of timeless elegance and contemporary design. From rings, necklaces, and earrings to stylish accessories, Tomei caters to a wide range of personal styles and occasions. Each piece is crafted with precision and passion, celebrating individuality and meaningful moments. Our diverse collections include both classic and modern styles, ensuring there's something for everyone. Customers can conveniently explore our offerings through detailed product listings and interactive E-brochures. Tomei is committed to quality, beauty, and exceptional customer experience—delivering luxury right to your doorstep.

name: Nextsale
description: Nextsale is a platform for adding powerful testimonials, notifying visitors about how busy the website is, and encouraging new visitors the purchase by showing them previous orders, retaining visitors at the time when they want to leave the page by showing promotional campaigns, Collect emails and SMS numbers with customizable popups, use freeshipping upsell promotions to boost the sales and enable customers to add social proof and exit-intent popups to turn visitors into customers.

name: Bundle Quotes
description: Bundle Quotes is a powerful property management and quoting platform designed to simplify real estate operations. It allows users to view, manage, and take action on property listings through an intuitive dashboard. Key property details such as address, city, state, area, and year are clearly displayed in a sortable table. Users can easily edit property data, delete entries, or generate personalised URLs (PURLs) for sharing or quoting. The platform offers seamless navigation and secure user access, making it ideal for real estate professionals and quoting agencies. Its user-friendly layout and real-time control tools enhance productivity and streamline property quote generation.

name: POF
description: Pakistan Ordnance Factories (POF) is the premier defense production facility in Pakistan, dedicated to manufacturing arms and ammunition for the nation's military and law enforcement. Their website promotes transparency and digitization through initiatives like the new E-Registration system for firms. This portal allows businesses to register online, ensuring a streamlined procurement process and offering discounts on bid money. POF also highlights their product range, tenders, and export catalog, aiming to foster efficient public-private engagement. The platform emphasizes security, innovation, and national service.

name: Pool Store
description: PoolStore is the UK’s favourite online destination for all swimming pool and spa essentials. Whether you're looking for above ground swimming pools to fit any budget or need chemicals and accessories to maintain your pool, PoolStore has you covered. Enjoy huge savings, a wide product selection, and free home delivery with every purchase. PoolStore caters to both casual users and seasoned pool owners, offering convenience and quality at competitive prices. Your one-stop shop for reliable and fast pool supply services, right from the comfort of your home.

name: OIL Bing
description: Project OIL Bing is a lead management platform designed for insurance professionals. It allows users to upload and organize customer lead files, displaying key details like names, addresses, and verification statuses. The system integrates with Bing images for address validation, enhancing accuracy. Users can delete or download individual leads for further action. With a clean, tabular interface, it streamlines lead tracking and outreach, making it ideal for insurance agents and marketers. The tool emphasizes efficiency, combining data management with geospatial verification.

name: Desom ERP
description: Desom ERP is a comprehensive enterprise resource planning system designed to streamline and manage Desom’s daily operations in a secure, controlled, and monitored environment. The system integrates key functional areas to enhance operational efficiency and decision-making. The Main Module acts as the central hub for system-wide configurations and reporting. The HR Module manages employee records, attendance, and payroll. Inventory Management ensures real-time tracking of stock levels and supplies. Outlet Shops Management enables centralized control over Desom’s retail outlets. The Order-taking Mobile App facilitates efficient field order entry and synchronization with the central system, supporting quick and accurate service delivery. Together, these modules provide a unified platform for Desom’s enterprise-wide needs.
note: Live link is not available as this system is deployed on local server of client due to data security concerns.

name: Only Insurance Leads
description: Only Insurance Leads is a proven lead generation company founded by former insurance agents who understand the real challenges of marketing in today’s regulatory environment. Originally created in Phoenix, Arizona to overcome DO NOT CALL and Caller ID restrictions, the program quickly propelled its creators to the #2 producing property/casualty agency out of 15,000 agents at a top-tier insurance carrier. Due to overwhelming interest from peers nationwide, Only Insurance Leads was born. With over 17 years in business, the company has successfully mailed more than 45 million personalized insurance quotes for agencies across the U.S. Their continued growth is driven by one simple truth—their program delivers real, measurable results.

name: Remotii
description: Remotii, Inc. is dedicated to empowering users with seamless control over their everyday environments through smart, intuitive technology. We design innovative hardware that enables users to remotely monitor and manage the devices they choose—whether it’s at home, in the office, or elsewhere—via a user-friendly web interface. At Remotii, the user is at the center of everything. From monitoring entry/exit points and temperature to controlling on/off states, users define what matters most. We simply provide the flexible platform to make it happen. With limitless customization and control, Remotii transforms how people interact with the world around them.

name: Only Mortgage Leads
description: Only Mortgage Leads is a direct mail marketing service tailored for mortgage professionals seeking to generate high-quality leads in a cost-effective and scalable way. The platform offers flexible pricing based on campaign size, with discounts for larger mail volumes. Users can easily create and send professionally branded mortgage quote letters through an intuitive system. Multiple secure payment options are supported, and the built-in ROI calculator helps lenders estimate campaign success and profitability. With a strong track record of nationwide service, Only Mortgage Leads empowers mortgage agents to reach more prospects and grow their business confidently.

name: ASAN Shopping
description: Asan Shopping is your trusted destination for high-quality products that combine science-based innovation with everyday convenience. We are committed to offering exceptional value without compromising on quality, ensuring you get the best for your money. At Asan Shopping, customer satisfaction is our priority—we stand behind every product we offer. With a focus on reliability and results, our curated selections are designed to meet your needs with confidence. Shop stress-free, knowing you're supported by a risk-free purchase policy and a dedication to excellence. Discover smarter solutions for a better lifestyle, only at Asan Shopping.

name: RPM Living
description: RPM Living is a forward-thinking, full-service multifamily property management, investment, and development company dedicated to excellence at every level. We specialize in acquiring, building, and operating exceptional rental communities that inspire trust from our investors and provide true sanctuary for our residents. With a deep passion for quality living and strong returns, we offer hands-on management, carefully curated investment opportunities, and unmatched development expertise. Our personalized approach sets us apart, delivering results and experiences that larger firms simply can't replicate. At RPM Living, we turn properties into communities and investments into success stories.

name: CLMNSS
description: CLMNSS brings the luxury of spa-quality massages directly to your doorstep—whether you're at home, in a hotel, or at the office. Our professional massage therapists are just a few clicks away, offering relaxation and relief on your schedule. With a seamless online booking experience and service availability in multiple locations, CLMNSS makes wellness more accessible than ever. Choose from a curated menu of massage options tailored to your needs. Whether it’s stress, tension, or simply the need to unwind, we deliver calm, comfort, and care wherever you are. Reclaim your time and your peace—your spa is now mobile.

name: Flavie Audi
description: Flavie Audi crafts luminous encounters between the material and the sublime, merging art, science, and the metaphysical. Her work embodies the flow of life and light, echoing the language of ethereal landscapes and imagined geologies. With forms that pulse with a living, fleeting energy, Audi blurs the lines between the digital and the celestial. Each piece invites ambiguity—hovering between screen-based abstraction and natural cosmic phenomena. In an increasingly virtual world, she reclaims presence and tactility, forging a new visual language that challenges the boundaries of perception and physicality. Her creations are portals to alternative dimensions—tangible yet dreamlike.

name: Ecospace
description: Ecospace is a design-led architectural studio co-managed by the award-winning team behind IPT Architects. Based in a vibrant central London mews, our diverse team thrives in an open-plan space designed to spark creativity and collaboration. Every project, from concept to completion, is closely guided by qualified architects, ensuring our high standards remain uncompromised. Our integrated design and production approach blends architectural vision with practical precision. We take pride in managing the full process in-house—delivering bespoke, high-quality results tailored to our clients’ needs. Ecospace is more than a studio; it’s a seamless fusion of craft, innovation, and design excellence.

name: Capella Properties
description: Capella Properties is a next-generation real estate company redefining property experiences in Dubai through innovation, trust, and customer-centric solutions. With a vision to become a key market player within its first year, Capella combines technology, market insight, and personalized service to deliver exceptional results. Whether buying, selling, or renting, we prioritize your unique lifestyle and preferences to match you with the perfect property. Our digital-first approach allows clients to explore tailored listings from the comfort of their home. Backed by international experience and deep market knowledge, we ensure smooth, transparent transactions. At Capella, you're not just a client—you’re the center of everything we do.

name: Bose Collins
description: Bose Collins is a multidisciplinary creative studio specializing in high-end visual storytelling across film, CG, and digital media. From concept to post-production, we deliver powerful narratives through creative direction, live action shooting, advanced CGI, 3D modeling, animation, VFX, and sound design. Our team brings bold ideas to life using cutting-edge techniques like particle simulation, AI whispering, and immersive composite rendering. With an obsessive attention to detail and a passion for innovation, Bose Collins crafts compelling content that resonates across media, screens, and platforms. We blur the lines between technology and art to redefine the limits of visual experience.

name: CHD Virtual Arts
description: CHD Virtual Arts (High Definition Virtual Art) is a passionate collective of photographers, editors, and developers dedicated to creating stunning, high-quality visual experiences. We blend photography, art, and virtual reality to deliver immersive visuals that bring properties, hotels, galleries, and businesses to life. Using professional DSLR equipment and top-tier lenses, we capture not just spaces—but the feeling behind them. Our team focuses on building lasting relationships with clients, ensuring each project reflects both artistic pride and business purpose. At CHD, we’re not software—we’re real people making visual storytelling personal, powerful, and accessible to all.

name: Protein
description: Protein, led by acclaimed Artistic Director Luca Silvestrini, is one of the UK’s most distinctive voices in contemporary dance theatre. For over 25 years, the company has captivated audiences with a dynamic blend of original choreography, text, music, and social commentary. Known for immersive and participatory storytelling, Protein breaks traditional boundaries to connect deeply with audiences in theatres, outdoor spaces, and communities. Notable productions include Border Tales, LOL (lots of love), May Contain Food, and The Little Prince. Their inclusion-focused work spans schools, hospitals, care homes, and refugee communities, earning widespread recognition—including The Stage’s Community Project of the Year 2023. Resident at Woolwich Works, Protein continues to inspire transformation through movement, story, and human connection.

name: Sarah Richardson
description: Sarah Richardson is a visionary fashion stylist, creative consultant, and editor with a deep-rooted understanding of fashion history and visual culture. A graduate of Central St Martins, she began her career as Head of Display at Browns London before rising to prominence as Contributing Fashion Editor—and later Global Fashion Director—of i-D Magazine, where she helped transform the brand’s digital and editorial presence under Vice. She spent eight years as Fashion Creative Director at Document Journal and is now the Co-Founder and Editor-in-Chief of Beyond Noise. Renowned for her original styling and creative direction, Sarah has played pivotal roles at iconic fashion houses including Yves Saint Laurent, Jil Sander, Lanvin, and Alexander McQueen. Her collaborations span global brands like Uniqlo and Calvin Klein, and photographers like Mario Sorrenti, Mert & Marcus, and Hedi Slimane, continuously shaping the cutting edge of fashion imagery and casting.

name: Richard Bush
description: Richard Bush is a self-taught British fashion photographer known for his striking portraiture and refined visual storytelling. A graduate in French Literature from King’s College London, he entered the creative scene through Creative Review and quickly transitioned into fashion, thanks to a pivotal connection with makeup artist Val Garland. His breakout editorial shoot for i-D Magazine launched a prolific freelance career spanning top publications like Vogue (US, UK, Italia, Japan, China), Another, Dazed, and Self Service. Richard is acclaimed for his mastery of the 10×8 format, capturing timeless imagery both in-studio and on location. His commercial portfolio includes campaigns for prestigious brands such as Cartier, YSL, Cavalli, H&M, and Yohji Yamamoto. With a distinctive aesthetic and dedication to craft, he remains a powerful force in contemporary fashion photography.

name: Joyce Wang Studio
description: Joyce Wang Studio is an internationally acclaimed interior architecture and design practice renowned for its luxurious, sculptural spaces rooted in storytelling. With a deep appreciation for materiality and craftsmanship, the studio blends art, design, and innovation to transform interiors into immersive experiences. Specializing in high-end hospitality, residential, and bespoke commissions, Joyce Wang Studio operates at the intersection of architecture and emotional impact. The elegant and minimal website design reflects the studio’s refined aesthetic and its urban, forward-thinking vision. With global projects from Hong Kong to London, the studio is recognized for its visionary design narratives and curated material palettes. Each space is meticulously crafted to provoke curiosity and elevate the everyday.

name: Haberdashery
description: Haberdashery is a London-based design studio celebrated for its poetic approach to light as a storytelling medium. Specializing in sculptural lighting, the studio creates emotionally resonant installations that blend light, material, and narrative. Each piece is intentionally crafted to evoke ineffable moments, delivering elegance and originality to luxury interiors worldwide. With over a decade of experience, Haberdashery has built a global reputation for innovation and meticulous detail in bespoke commissions. Their collections—designed for both residential and hospitality spaces—offer rich materiality, refined form, and ethereal lighting. Every sculpture, whether from their core range or custom-tailored, is designed to create deep visual and emotional impact. Haberdashery’s work speaks a universal language—light as art.
industry: Lighting Design & Sculptural Art for Interior Architecture
